articles.title: Former State Police union head, lobbyist get more prison time for fraud, racketeering
articles.description:
The former union president and lobbyist were arrested in August 2019 and have been embroiled in the charges ever since.

The post Former State Police union head, lobbyist get more prison time for fraud, racketeering appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Former State Police union head and lobbyist sentenced for fraud and racketeering.
Charges stem from arrests in August 2019, impacting local law enforcement trust.
Increased prison time highlights ongoing issues of corruption within Massachusetts law enforcement.

articles.title: Boston 25 News head meteorologist Kevin Lemanowicz departing after 3 decades with the station
articles.description:
“It has been the privilege of a lifetime to serve this community. Thank you for welcoming me into your homes each night,” said the Boston 25 meteorologist.

The post Boston 25 News head meteorologist Kevin Lemanowicz departing after 3 decades with the station appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Kevin Lemanowicz is leaving Boston 25 News after 30 years as head meteorologist.
He expressed gratitude for the community's support during his tenure.
Residents will need to adjust to a new meteorologist for local weather updates.

articles.title: Red Sox release statement after outcry over flawed jersey design
articles.description:
"The updated jerseys will be ready for Opening Day. We are grateful to our partners for their ongoing support.”

The post Red Sox release statement after outcry over flawed jersey design appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox acknowledge flawed jersey design following fan complaints.
Updated jerseys will be available by Opening Day, April 1, 2024.
Local fans can expect improved designs and continued support from the team.

articles.title: Pawtucket police find firearms in ice rink shooter’s storage locker, identify ‘courageous citizens’ who intervened
articles.description:
In addition to the firearms found in the storage locker, investigators confirmed that both guns at the shooting belonged to the suspect.

The post Pawtucket police find firearms in ice rink shooter’s storage locker, identify ‘courageous citizens’ who intervened appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Pawtucket police discovered firearms in the ice rink shooter's storage locker.
Both guns used in the shooting were confirmed to belong to the suspect.
Courageous citizens intervened during the incident, enhancing community safety.

articles.title: MBTA announces service changes and suspensions for March
articles.description:
Service at some Orange Line and Commuter Rail stations will be suspended for signal and modernization work, the MBTA said.

The post MBTA announces service changes and suspensions for March appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: MBTA suspends service at select Orange Line and Commuter Rail stations in March.
Signal and modernization work will affect multiple stations, impacting daily commuters.
Residents should plan for delays and alternative transportation during this period.

articles.title: Rafael Devers reacts to Red Sox exec’s ‘pick up a glove’ comment
articles.description:
"Let’s concentrate here and just leave the past in the past.”

The post Rafael Devers reacts to Red Sox exec’s ‘pick up a glove’ comment appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Rafael Devers addresses comments from Red Sox executive Tom Werner on February 18.
Devers emphasizes focusing on the present, urging to leave past issues behind.
Local fans await Devers' performance as the Red Sox prepare for the upcoming season.

articles.title: Adam Schefter maps out potential price for Patriots in Maxx Crosby trade
articles.description:
"I was told that the Raiders don’t want to trade him and that if they even contemplated it, it would take a Micah Parsons-type package."

The post Adam Schefter maps out potential price for Patriots in Maxx Crosby trade appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Raiders unlikely to trade Maxx Crosby, according to Adam Schefter.
Crosby would require a trade package similar to Micah Parsons.
Patriots' potential trade impacts their defensive strategy for the upcoming season.

articles.title: Fleet’s Aerin Frankel, Team USA ready for yet another gold-medal showdown against Canada
articles.description:
Team USA and Canada will meet for the seventh time in an Olympics gold-medal game.

The post Fleet’s Aerin Frankel, Team USA ready for yet another gold-medal showdown against Canada appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Team USA faces Canada for the seventh time in Olympic gold-medal history.
Aerin Frankel, a Boston native, represents the Fleet in this crucial match.
Victory could boost local support for women's hockey in Boston and beyond.

articles.title: What Steve Kerr, Al Horford said about adding Kristaps Porzingis to the Warriors
articles.description:
The Warriors picked up Porzingis at the trade deadline, ending his brief stint with Atlanta.

The post What Steve Kerr, Al Horford said about adding Kristaps Porzingis to the Warriors appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Warriors acquired Kristaps Porzingis from Atlanta at the trade deadline.
Steve Kerr and Al Horford commented on Porzingis's potential impact.
Boston residents may see increased competition in upcoming games against the Warriors.
